sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_script"><sys_transform_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><map display_value="Cisco Contract Lifecycle TM">77b6e4292f5020100a8bd39df699b697</map><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[(function runTransformScript(source, map, log, target /*undefined onStart*/ ) {
    /*var logger = new Cisco_BCS_SNLogger();
    var daoScript = new Cisco_DAOScript();
    try {
        logger.debug("Inside Contract Lifecycle transform map.");
        var sys_id = daoScript.getReferenceMapping("assets", "serial_number", target.sr_no);
        target.asset = sys_id;

        target.update();
    } catch (e) {
        logger.error("Exception caught inside Contract Lifecycle transform map. Error : - " + e);
    }*/
	
	var dao = new Cisco_DAOScript();
	
	// Assets
	var resultAssets = dao.createReferences(target.sr_no, "serial_number", "contract", target.sys_id, "x_caci_cisco_bcs_cisco_assets", true);
	if(resultAssets){
		target.asset = resultAssets + "";
		target.update();
		var gr = new GlideRecord("x_caci_cisco_bcs_cisco_assets");
		if(gr.get(resultAssets)){
		dao.assetCalculatedFields(target.sys_id,gr);
		}
	}
	
	//dao.createContractBulletin(target);
	//dao.insertInAssetCovered(target, "serial_number", target.sr_no+"", "assets", true);
	
// 	target.update();

})(source, map, log, target);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_transform_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-11-10 09:21:52</sys_created_on><sys_id>bd55aacf07502010d610f87e7c1ed01f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>15</sys_mod_count><sys_name>onAfter</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Cisco BCS Operational Insights" source="x_caci_cisco_bcs">56b8d9362f3310108956ea5ef699b62d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Cisco BCS Operational Insights">56b8d9362f3310108956ea5ef699b62d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_script_bd55aacf07502010d610f87e7c1ed01f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-02-08 10:16:52</sys_updated_on><when>onAfter</when></sys_transform_script></record_update>
